name: Re:Run (ktrinidad, synomint, Akyudorai, Kainat)
description:
Vertigo Heights is not your typical metropolis. 

Rather, it is a parkour playground, home to thrill seekers and adrenaline junkies from all walks of life. At the heart of it lies the Skyline Guild, which hosts a series of competitions, dubbed affectionately by the locals as Re:Run due to the nature of their tasks. Open to the general public, these competitions offer parkour veterans the chance to attain unfathomable fame and fortune through intense races across the city.

Re:Run is a third person parkour game that equips players with a variety of movement tricks to traverse the city.

Join Runners Bea and Nyx in their adventures through Vertigo Heights as they hone in on their parkour skills through races all while helping the locals with their day to day tasks!

Features:

  • A free (in-game) phone provided by the Skyline Guild
  • Wallrunning, ziplining, and rail grinding
  • 5 races and 13 quests to complete
  • 3 different collectible types
  • Mithunan Bear

This game was developed for GameCon 2023 by the team, Sea Drive:

Kyra Trinidad 

Project Manager, Concept/2D Artist

Cody Jensen

Programmer, Environment Designer

Mithunan Jayaseelan 

Programmer, Sound Designer

Nathaniel Moore

3D Artist

Kainat Rashid

Technical Artist

Special thanks to our friend, Winston Qi, for the music and race completion tracks

Royalty free sound effects provided by: Pixabay
